channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former teacher reveals which students suffered 'the most' under Walz's pandemic-era guidelines
item.description: A former Minnesota teacher told Fox News Digital that rules enforced by Gov. Tim Walz during the coronavirus pandemic poorly impacted immigrant students.

item.title: Biden bids farewell by touting legacy, urging voters to back Harris
item.description: President Biden on Monday bid farewell to the party he faithfully served for more than five decades, taking credit for his accomplishments and laying out the case that Vice President Kamala Harris is the heir to his legacy.

item.title: The Biden Family Scandal
item.description: The impeachment report prepared by House Republicans is an essential part of any record of the Biden-Harris administration.

item.title: Is Kamala Harris Lying About Her Positions Now, Or Was She Lying Before?
item.description: Harris, seeking to unburden herself from what has been, is running from her radical leftist record as senator and vice president.

item.title: Obama to headline 2nd night of Democratic National Convention
item.description: Former President Barack Obama will headline the second night of the DNC under the banner of the Democrat Party's “Bold Vision for America’s Future."

item.title: Rep. James Clyburn calls Kamala Harris 'battle-tested'
item.description: Democratic kingmaker Rep. James Clyburn on Monday touted Vice President Kamala Harris as "battle-tested" and said she will rise to a challenging moment in American politics.

item.title: Quantifying Medicare for All, Harris-style
item.description: The cost of the vice president’s vision of government-provided health care, outlined during the 2019 primary, would be stupendous.

item.title: New Party Platform Showcases Democrats’ Delusions About Who Are The Bad Guys
item.description: The delusional Democratic Party absurdly claiming it will save democracy from Donald Trump doesn’t need a convention, it needs a mirror.

item.title: Florida's Rick Scott, Matt Gaetz to face primary challengers as several states head to polls Tuesday
item.description: Florida primary races feature Rep. Matt Gaetz, amid his feud with former House Speaker Kevin McCarthy, and Sen. Rick Scott, who hopes to lead the party in the Senate next Congress.

item.title: Judge rejects Hunter Biden's bid to use Trump ruling to get his federal tax case dismissed
item.description: A federal judge on Monday denied Hunter Biden's latest bid to dismiss the tax charges against him, setting the stage for his trial to begin next month in California.

item.title: The Media Bristle at Inconvenient Facts on Immigration
item.description: They can’t handle the truth.

item.title: Democrats’ Abortion Van At The DNC Offers A Glimpse Of America’s Future
item.description: The moral logic at work here is inexorable. What you see now at the DNC you will eventually see at the RNC.

item.title: Trump says Kamala Harris will not participate in Fox News debate on Sept. 4
item.description: Former President Trump claims Vice President Kamala Harris has declined to participate in a Fox News presidential debate in Pennsylvania on September 4.

item.title: WATCH: Ocasio-Cortez slams Trump at DNC, highlights need for ceasefire in Gaza
item.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez bashed former President Donald Trump in her prime-time speech at the Democratic National Convention Monday, saying he's motivated by greed instead of patriotism.

item.title: Germany’s Brilliant Police Strategy: Give Us Your Knife, Get Free Netflix
item.description: Knife violence and mass immigration are merging into a crisis European officials are reluctant to seriously address.

item.title: Democrats Praise Veep Pick As ‘America’s Dad’ While Literally Neutering Men
item.description: It's an the odd juxtaposition: celebrating Walz as a father figure at the exact same time Democrats are pushing to make sure fewer men ever become fathers.

item.title: Put policy aside: Kamala Harris will win or lose based on the excitement factor
item.description: While the mainstream media is pining for a more comprehensive Kamala Harris policy agenda, substance may not appeal to the average voter in the 2024 Presidential election.

item.title: Hillary Clinton hands the baton to Kamala Harris
item.description: Hillary Rodham Clinton, the first woman to secure a major party's presidential nomination, turned the baton over to Vice President Kamala Harris on Monday, saying she has what it takes to beat Donald Trump in November.

item.title: 2024 Democratic National Convention: Live Updates
item.description: Follow along for live updates and analysis from the NR team on the Democratic National Convention.

item.title: Now We Know Why Kamala And The Media Don’t Want To Talk Policy
item.description: Kamala Harris can't talk policy because she has no vision. No wonder Democrats and the news media are focusing on her 'joy' and 'vibes.'
